lines.text: Private Stauffer, reporting for doggy duty, sir.
[stunned voice and look, over her face, after hearing his remark]
Is that how you see this program?

[while reading a letter from Peggy and Jimbo, addressed to Chips]
What's with you and chickens?

[Sternly to Chips, as he was eyeing a canary, of a lady, carrying a canary, bus was coming in to the bus route, but quietly to others, on bus]
Don't even think about it!
[Chips turns his head, from looking at the canary, back to Danny Stauffer after heaing his command & it is the movie's final verbal remark, then the Closing Credits begin]

[as Sgt. Rust goes to the barracks]
The Bible had it all wrong, there is not just heaven and hell. They forgot to mention me, drill-sergeant Rust. It is time to rise and shine girls. My wish is your command.
Are you dreaming, sweetheart? This is not your home, I am not your mother. Get up! Do you understand?
[Sargeant Rust then lifted Stauffer's bed and knocking Stauffer to the floor and waking him up]
